title: Cheater's golubtsy (Stuffed cabbage)
ingredients: ['1 head cabbage, leaves separated and shredded', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, minced', '1 carrot, shredded', '250g pork mince', '250g beef mince', '100g rice', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '2 tablespoons soured cream', '2 bay leaves', '3 cloves of garlic, minced']
